### Request for Proposal: Translation and Editing Services
#### Introduction

The Canadian Museum of Immigration at Pier 21 invites qualified firms to submit proposals for Translation and Editing Services. This three-year term contract aims to provide accurate and timely translation services in either direction (English to French and French to English) on an “as and when” required basis.

#### Contract Details
* **Reference Number**: cb-41-49668212
* **Publication Date**: October 26, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 6, 2023, at 13:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2027
* **Contract Value**: Not available
* **Terms and Conditions**: As per Canadian government procurement regulations

#### Tender Requirements
* The successful bidder will be expected to provide translation and editing services for museum content, meeting the required quality standards.
* The services will be performed on an “as and when” required basis.
* The contract is for a three-year term, with options to extend.

#### Evaluation Criteria
The proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:
* Technical Merit (60%): The ability of the bidder to meet the required quality standards and deliver translation services in either direction (English to French and French to English).
* Price (40%): The lowest evaluated price will be awarded the contract.

#### Tendering Procedure
This is an open bidding process, with no limited tendering. Interested bidders must submit their proposal in the provided format by the closing date.
